snippet: POLLACK--Mark S. We mourn the untimely death of our beloved Mark, our cherished and devoted cousin. Our hearts are forever broken. We express our heartfelt condolences to his wife Jamie, their dear children Jessie, Ali and A.J., his mother Yetta and sister Nancy and our extended family, whose unfathomable loss we share. May we find comfort together with all those who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Tzipi & David, Rachie & Lionel, Courtney & Raph and our boys 1/3
lead_paragraph: POLLACK--Mark S. We mourn the untimely death of our beloved Mark, our cherished and devoted cousin. Our hearts are forever broken. We express our heartfelt condolences to his wife Jamie, their dear children Jessie, Ali and A.J., his mother Yetta and sister Nancy and our extended family, whose unfathomable loss we share. May we find comfort together with all those who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Tzipi & David, Rachie & Lionel, Courtney & Raph and our boys 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  POLLACK, MARK S
